full_text: --- Page 1 --- CelcomDigi Prepaid 5G Kuning Plan Details Basic Plan Details: Eligibility: - New Digi Prepaid activation customers, MNP customers, or plan switchers. - Minimum age requirement: 12 years old. Rates: - Voice Call: RM0.30/min (to all networks within Malaysia) - Video Call: RM0.30/min (to all networks within Malaysia) - SMS: RM0.20/SMS - MMS: RM0.50/SMS - Free Basic Internet: 500MB/month at 64kbps. Validity Extension: - Credit reloads or subscriptions extend account validity. - Super Long Life extensions available (e.g., RM108 for 365 days). Monthly Passes: Name: 5G 25 (High Speed) - Price: RM25 - Base Quota: 30GB - Hotspot: 6GB - Unlimited Quota: - - Calls: Unlimited All Net - Validity: 30 days - Auto Renewal: Yes Name: 5G 35 (Unlimited) - Price: RM35 --- Page 2 --- - Base Quota: - - Hotspot: 3GB - Unlimited Quota: Unlimited (3Mbps) - Calls: RM0.30/min - Validity: 30 days - Auto Renewal: Yes Name: 5G 39 (High Speed) - Price: RM39 - Base Quota: 75GB - Hotspot: 6GB - Unlimited Quota: - - Calls: Unlimited All Net - Validity: 30 days - Auto Renewal: Yes Name: 5G 69 (High Speed) - Price: RM69 - Base Quota: 155GB - Hotspot: 15GB - Unlimited Quota: - - Calls: Unlimited All Net - Validity: 30 days - Auto Renewal: Yes Quota Top-Up: Price: RM6 Quota: 15GB --- Page 3 --- Validity: Follows Monthly Pass Internet validity One-Time Passes: Category: Hourly - Price: RM1 - Quota: Unlimited Internet - Validity: 1 hour Category: Daily - Price: RM3 - Quota: 3GB - Validity: 1 day Category: Daily - Price: RM8 - Quota: 1,000GB - Validity: 3 days
